thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Oaktree Capital Group Announces Launch Of Public Offering Of Class A Units

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Oaktree Capital Group Announces Launch Of Public Offering Of Class A Units
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Oaktree Capital Group Llc:
* OAKTREE CAPITAL GROUP, LLC ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF PUBLIC OFFERING OF CLASS A UNITS
* OAKTREE CAPITAL GROUP LLC - ‍ANNOUNCED A PUBLIC OFFERING OF 5 MILLION CLASS A UNITS BY OAKTREE​
* OAKTREE CAPITAL GROUP LLC - ‍INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO ACQUIRE INTERESTS IN ITS BUSINESS FROM CERTAIN OF ITS DIRECTORS, OTHERS​
* OAKTREE CAPITAL GROUP LLC - ‍WILL NOT RETAIN ANY PROCEEDS FROM SALE OF CLASS A UNITS IN OFFERING​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
